00019 #ifndef _ALCHEMY_QUEUE_H
00020 #define _ALCHEMY_QUEUE_H
00021 
00022 #include <copperplate/list.h>
00023 #include <copperplate/syncobj.h>
00024 #include <copperplate/cluster.h>
00025 #include <copperplate/heapobj.h>
00026 #include <alchemy/queue.h>
00027 
00028 struct alchemy_queue {
00029         unsigned int magic;     /* Must be first. */
00030         char name[32];
00031         int mode;
00032         size_t limit;
00033         struct heapobj hobj;
00034         struct syncobj sobj;
00035         struct clusterobj cobj;
00036         struct list mq;
00037         unsigned int mcount;
00038 };
00039 
00040 #define queue_magic     0x8787ebeb
00041 
00042 struct alchemy_queue_msg {
00043         size_t size;
00044         unsigned int refcount;
00045         struct holder next;
00046         /* Payload data follows. */
00047 };
00048 
00049 struct alchemy_queue_wait {
00050         struct alchemy_queue_msg *msg;
00051         void *userbuf;
00052         size_t usersz;
00053 };
00054 
00055 extern struct syncluster alchemy_queue_table;
00056 
00057 #endif /* _ALCHEMY_QUEUE_H */
